title: Impeachment: American Crime Story | Official Trailer | FX
author: FX Networks
comment: They did Monica dirty. Her life was ruined after this. Glad to see she's actually an executive producer here, taking ownership of her own story.
sarah paulson is unrecognizable, she’s going to win her secound emmy
Spoiler alert: he did in fact have sexual relations with that woman.
I can already hear half of that cast being called on stage to collect their Emmy’s. This looks absolutely phenomenal.
I am so excited that Monica is a co-producer - it's her time to take control of her own narrative and have a voice. Good for her after all that has happened
description:
FX’s award-winning series returns. Watch the OFFICIAL TRAILER for Impeachment: American Crime Story - starring Sarah Paulson as Linda Tripp and Beanie Feldstein as Monica Lewinsky. Premieres September 7, only on FX.

Subscribe now for more American Crime Story clips:
